column5: Kind of a general question but i'm heading to Lac Seul this coming weekend for the first time. Any tips - hot spots - bait used - depth - troll - drift - jig or any general information for someone who hasn't fished here before? From my understanding we are staying on the south end near Hudson. Any info would be appreciated.

I'm no expert but we were at Lac Seul a couple of weeks ago. Our best results came from fishing the wind blown shore ( close to deep water )and using a jig & minnow combo. Chartruse & Green 3/8 jig in 18 -23' of water was our ticket. Have fun!!
